message.content:
cs.SE, cs.PL, cs.LO, cs.SY, cs.AI. 

The paper proposes a unified specification language for defining test objectives, which is relevant to software engineering (cs.SE) and programming languages (cs.PL). The paper also discusses a formal semantics for the language, which is related to logic in computer science (cs.LO). The paper's focus on encoding and supporting numerous existing criteria suggests a systems (cs.SY) perspective. Finally, the paper's mention of experiments suggests a potential application of artificial intelligence (cs.AI) in evaluating the proposed approach.
